General_Description: '''Shop Talk''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: After discovering a coded message, one man realized his employer was a spy. Afraid, and understandably so, he asked Kassandra for help.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
